description: includes both liquid and solid phases
comment: at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases.  This is the 3-hour mean precipitation flux.

comment: the mass of water in all phases in a thin surface soil layer.

Long name: Surface Temperature Where Land or Sea Ice
description: "skin" temperature of all surfaces except open ocean.
comment: "skin" temperature of all surfaces except open ocean, sampled synoptically.

structure title: Instantaneous value (i.e. synoptic or time-step value), Global field (single level) [XY-na] [fixed]

description: Convective precipitation at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases.
comment: at surface.  This is a 3-hour mean convective precipitation flux.

description: at surface; includes precipitation of all forms of water in the solid phase
comment: at surface.  Includes precipitation of all forms water in the solid phase.  This is the 3-hour mean snowfall flux.

description: The total run-off (including drainage through the base of the soil model) per unit area leaving the land portion of the grid cell.
comment: the total runoff (including "drainage" through the base of the soil model) leaving the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell, averaged over the 3-hour interval.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean

description: surface solar irradiance clear sky for UV calculations
surface pressure (not mean sea-level pressure), 2-D field to calculate the 3-D pressure field from hybrid coordinates
comment: sampled synoptically to diagnose atmospheric tides, this is better than mean sea level pressure.
structure title: Instantaneous value (i.e. synoptic or time-step value), Global field (single level) [XY-na] [tpt]

description: Total cloud area fraction for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.
comment: for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Include both large-scale and convective cloud.  This is a 3-hour mean.
